metadata.description: Master index of all character cards for easy searching and filtering

characters.name: Agent
characters.description: Forces players to card share with you once per round.

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: King must card share with you or Blue Team loses.

characters.name: Alien
characters.description: Steals cards from anyone who card shares with you.

characters.name: Ambassador
characters.description: Immune to all powers, can move freely between rooms.

characters.name: Amnesiac
characters.description: Guess the buried card's team to win.

characters.name: Anarchist
characters.description: Win by helping usurp leaders in most rounds.

characters.name: Angel
characters.description: Must always tell the truth verbally.

characters.name: Apprentice
characters.description: Backup for Alchemist if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Assassin
characters.description: End with President (no Bomber) to win as Yellow Team and beat Blue.

characters.name: Beholder
characters.description: Win by seeing any part of a player's card face.

characters.name: The Black
characters.description: Win if anyone color shares with you.

characters.name: Blind
characters.description: Must keep eyes closed throughout the game.

characters.name: Blue Drone
characters.description: Blue wins if you're in same room as Red Fist.

characters.name: Blue Firecracker
characters.description: Backup for Blue Drone if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Blue Team
characters.description: Win if President doesn't gain the dead condition.

characters.name: Bomber
characters.description: Everyone in your room gains dead condition at game end.

characters.name: Body Snatcher
characters.description: Steals cards and can show them as face cards.

characters.name: Born Leader
characters.description: Win if you're a room's leader at game end.

characters.name: Bouncer
characters.description: Prevents players from leaving your room (odd player count).

characters.name: Bully
characters.description: Force players to reveal their character, not just their color.

characters.name: Butler
characters.description: Win if you're with Maid and President at game end.

characters.name: Capitalist
characters.description: Recruit players to Blue Team; help your team protect the President.

characters.name: Centipede
characters.description: Players who share with you must stay with you or publicly reveal.

characters.name: Changer
characters.description: Swap your card for a random card from the Fun Deck.

characters.name: Cleaner
characters.description: Removes conditions from players who card share with you.

characters.name: Clone
characters.description: Win if first person you share with wins.

characters.name: Clown
characters.description: Keep smiling throughout the game while pursuing your team's goal.

characters.name: Conspirator
characters.description: Flip enemy players to secretly work for your team's goal.

characters.name: Coy Boy
characters.description: Can only color share, never card share.

characters.name: Criminal
characters.description: Silence players to prevent them from sharing information.

characters.name: Cult Leader
characters.description: Spread your cult, but stay alive or all your cultists lose too.

characters.name: Cupid
characters.description: Makes two players fall in love with each other.

characters.name: Dealer
characters.description: Make players foolish so they can't refuse risky shares.

characters.name: Decoy
characters.description: Win if Sniper shoots you at game end.

characters.name: Demon
characters.description: Must always lie verbally.

characters.name: Doctor
characters.description: President must card share with you or Blue Team loses.

characters.name: Dragon
characters.description: Everyone in your room gains toast condition at game end.

characters.name: Dragon Egg
characters.description: Backup for Dragon if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Dr. Boom
characters.description: Game ends immediately if you card share with President.

characters.name: Drunk
characters.description: Start as Drunk, become sober character in last round.

characters.name: Easter Bunny
characters.description: Hide character cards for players to find.

characters.name: Eggineer
characters.description: Dragon must card share with you or Red Team loses.

characters.name: Engineer
characters.description: Bomber must card share with you or Red Team loses.

characters.name: Enforcer
characters.description: Forces two players to card share with each other.

characters.name: Enlisted
characters.description: Publicly reveal to become a hostage automatically.

characters.name: Eris
characters.description: Makes two players hate each other.

characters.name: Exhibitionist
characters.description: Can only publicly reveal, never card or color share.

characters.name: Fanatic
characters.description: Backup for Eggineer if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Father
characters.description: Choose two children, win if they end with President.

characters.name: Fat Princess
characters.description: Backup for King if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Firefighter
characters.description: Gives fireproof condition to President.

characters.name: Fool
characters.description: Can never refuse a card or color share offer.

characters.name: Frotteur
characters.description: Must touch every player by game end without Prude catching you.

characters.name: Fugitive
characters.description: Game ends immediately if you card share with One-Armed Man.

characters.name: Gambler
characters.description: Publicly guess which team won at game end to win.

characters.name: Gargoyle
characters.description: Publicly reveal to avoid being selected to leave room.

characters.name: Gorgon
characters.description: Petrify players to prevent them from voting or usurping.

characters.name: Grey Team
characters.description: Must choose to join Red or Blue Team before game ends.

characters.name: Hero
characters.description: Win if you're with both President and Bomber when the bomb goes off.

characters.name: Hot Potato
characters.description: Trade cards with anyone who card/color shares with you.

characters.name: Hunter
characters.description: Steals cards from players who use card share powers on you.

characters.name: Hypnotist
characters.description: Make players believe they're different characters to create chaos.

characters.name: Identity Thief
characters.description: Trade cards and gain shy condition on card share.

characters.name: Illuminati
characters.description: Win if anyone card shares with you.

characters.name: Immunologist
characters.description: Immune to all powers and conditions.

characters.name: Informer
characters.description: Collects cards from opposing team, breaks ties.

characters.name: Interrogator
characters.description: Ask one yes/no question per round to any player.

characters.name: Intern
characters.description: Win if you're in same room as President at game end.

characters.name: Judge
characters.description: Breaks ties by counting collected red vs blue cards.

characters.name: Juliet
characters.description: Win if you're with Romeo and Bomber at game end.

characters.name: Kangaroo
characters.description: Switch rooms and kick out one player.

characters.name: King
characters.description: Blue wins if you don't gain the toast condition.

characters.name: Leprechaun
characters.description: Trade cards with anyone, Leprechaun always wins.

characters.name: Loyalist
characters.description: Immune to traitor condition, removes it from others.

characters.name: Mad Scientist
characters.description: Force two players to trade cards once per game.

characters.name: Maid
characters.description: Win if you're with Butler and President at game end.

characters.name: Marshal
characters.description: Game ends immediately if you card share with Fugitive.

characters.name: Martyr
characters.description: Backup for Bomber if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Mastermind
characters.description: Guess every player's color at game end to win.

characters.name: Mastermind (version 2)
characters.description: Win if you're leader and were leader of opposite room.

characters.name: Mayor
characters.description: Your vote counts as two votes when publicly revealed.

characters.name: Medic
characters.description: Removes all conditions from players who card share.

characters.name: MI6
characters.description: Win if you card share with both Bomber and President.

characters.name: Mime
characters.description: Must remain completely silent throughout the game.

characters.name: Minion
characters.description: Win if no leader is usurped in your room.

characters.name: Mistress
characters.description: Win if you're with President and Wife is not.

characters.name: Moby
characters.description: Win if Ahab gains dead condition and you don't.

characters.name: Mother
characters.description: Choose two children, win if they don't die (unless Bomber).

characters.name: Mummy
characters.description: Gives cursed condition, prevents making noise.

characters.name: Negotiator
characters.description: Can only card share, never other reveal types.

characters.name: Ninja
characters.description: Remove yourself and one player from the game.

characters.name: Nuclear Tyrant
characters.description: Win if neither President nor Bomber card share with you; can't refuse shares.

characters.name: Nurse
characters.description: Backup for Doctor if they die or are buried.

characters.name: One-Armed Man
characters.description: Game ends immediately if you card share with Witness.

characters.name: Paparazzo
characters.description: Must be intrusive and prevent private conversations.

characters.name: Paper
characters.description: Win if with Rock but not with Scissors.

characters.name: Paranoid
characters.description: Can only card share once per game.

characters.name: Piper
characters.description: Players who card share must stay in same room as you.

characters.name: Pirate
characters.description: Force a player to be a hostage this round.

characters.name: President
characters.description: Blue wins if you don't gain the dead condition.

characters.name: President's Daughter
characters.description: Backup for President if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Private Investigator
characters.description: Guess the buried card's identity to win.

characters.name: Professor
characters.description: Force players to only card share, preventing other reveal types.

characters.name: Prude
characters.description: Win if you grab Frotteur's wrist by game end.

characters.name: Psychologist
characters.description: Can card share with shy/coy/paranoid players.

characters.name: Pyrotech
characters.description: Gives firebomb condition to Bomber.

characters.name: Queen
characters.description: Win if President gains dead condition and you don't.

characters.name: Rageaholic
characters.description: Win by counting to ten during parlay as leader.

characters.name: Rat
characters.description: Publicly reveal to spy in opposite room, must return.

characters.name: Red Fist
characters.description: Red wins if you're not in same room as Blue Drone.

characters.name: Red Foot
characters.description: Backup for Red Fist if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Red Team
characters.description: Win if President gains the dead condition.

characters.name: Rival
characters.description: Win if you're NOT in same room as President.

characters.name: Robot
characters.description: Win if first person you share with fails to win.

characters.name: Rock
characters.description: Win if with Scissors but not with Paper.

characters.name: Romeo
characters.description: Win if you're with Juliet and Bomber at game end.

characters.name: Scissors
characters.description: Win if with Paper but not with Rock.

characters.name: Secret Police
characters.description: Win if you catch players gameplaying between rounds.

characters.name: Security
characters.description: Prevent a player from leaving or force public reveal.

characters.name: Seer
characters.description: See all cards at game start, gain shy condition.

characters.name: Shy Guy
characters.description: Cannot reveal any part of your card to anyone.

characters.name: Sniper
characters.description: Shoot a player at game end, win if it's the Target.

characters.name: Socialist
characters.description: Recruit players to Red Team; help your team find the President.

characters.name: Spy
characters.description: Your card shows opposite team color.

characters.name: Stunt Double
characters.description: Win if in opposite room as President and gain dead.

characters.name: Survivor
characters.description: Win if you're NOT in same room as Bomber.

characters.name: Target
characters.description: Win if Sniper doesn't shoot you at game end.

characters.name: Telepath
characters.description: Predict which hostage enters your room at game end.

characters.name: Tentaclese
characters.description: Grab a player and bring them to your room (odd count).

characters.name: Thug
characters.description: Force players to only color share, limiting their information sharing.

characters.name: Time Lord
characters.description: Can end any round early by publicly revealing.

characters.name: Tinkerer
characters.description: Backup for Engineer if they die or are buried.

characters.name: Trader
characters.description: Trade your card for the buried card once per round.

characters.name: Tuesday Knight
characters.description: Game ends immediately if you card share with Bomber.

characters.name: Usurper
characters.description: Publicly reveal to automatically usurp the leader.

characters.name: Vampire
characters.description: Seduce players to control their actions and votes.

characters.name: Victim
characters.description: Win if you're in same room as Bomber at game end.

characters.name: Villain
characters.description: Win if with President and opposite room as Bomber.

characters.name: Voyeur
characters.description: Can peek at the buried card anytime during the game.

characters.name: Werewolf
characters.description: Bite players to make them answer your questions honestly.

characters.name: Wife
characters.description: Win if you're with President and Mistress is not.

characters.name: Witness
characters.description: Game ends immediately if you card share with Marshal.

characters.name: Xenohunter
characters.description: Remove a blue player who publicly reveals.

characters.name: Xenomorph
characters.description: Impregnate first blue player who shares with you.

characters.name: Yog Sothoth
characters.description: Win if anyone card or color shares with you.

characters.name: Zombie
characters.description: Convert all living players to Team Zombie by game end to win.
